Pass without Trace

Level 2 Abjuration Spell

Call forth a veil of shadows and silence that gives you and all nearby companions a +10 bonus to Stealth Checks.

Pass without Trace is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Pass without Trace is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Pass without Trace Information

Description: Call forth a veil of shadows and silence that gives you and all nearby companions a +10 bonus to Stealth Checks. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Abjuration School Casting Time: Action Duration: Until Long Rest Range: Self 9m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None

Druid Ranger Trickery Domain (Cleric Subclass) Circle of the Moon (Druid Subclass) Circle of the Land (Druid Subclass) Circle of Spores (Druid Subclass) Bard (Magical Secrets feature)
